thread.title: Win Matilda The Musical Tickets plus dinner at Tuttons
thread.title_full: Win Matilda The Musical Tickets plus dinner at Tuttons - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Matilda The Musical Tickets plus dinner at Tuttons
text: Enjoy a pre-theatre meal at Tuttons. One of the most famous and long standing restaurants in Covent Garden, with a gorgeous interior designed by Russell Sage and a seasonal British menu. Located but a stoneâ€™s throw away from the West Ends top theatres and shows, Tuttons is popular choice to enjoy a meal before your performance. Then, head over to the Cambridge Theatre for Matilda The Musical. Matilda The Musical is the multi-award winning musical from the Royal Shakespeare Company, inspired by the beloved book by the incomparable Roald Dahl. With book by Dennis Kelly and original songs by Tim Minchin, Matilda The Musical is the story of an extraordinary little girl who, armed with a vivid imagination and a sharp mind, dares to take a stand and change her own destiny. Competition ends on Monday, 30 November 2015 Terms and Conditions Online Form - Win Matilda The Musical Tickets plus dinner at Tuttons telegraph.co.uk
